course_comments: Hard and unclear. He has great insights and really cares about what every single student has to say.
instructor_comments: lazy students, does not understand requirements

course_comments: It took him forever to reply to my emails.
He never told us what he wanted on the assignments, and no matter what I tried, I kept getting Cs on my assignments.

This is a challenging course. There is a wide breadth of topics covered in a short period of time; be prepared to work. This is especially challenging if taken in the distance learning environment. It takes discipline to do.

I really enjoyed this class. I liked the in-class demos/examples to help remember the material. I also liked that one exam was dropped. It was a nice reward for working hard throughout the semester. I would recommend Eric as an instructor to those looking to take this course.

I thought this class was fantastic. It was definitely my favorite class this semester. I thought the course matter was interesting and Eric was a very good teacher. He was entertaining and engaged and he always communicated things in a clear way. If he did go through things too fast for some people, he would always go back and make sure to clarify any confusion.
He is funny and always willing to help. He knows the material inside and out. I learned more in the lab than in the lectures
instructor_comments: always late, half the class is missing

course_comments: I like that he allowed student participates a lot the class. The class is usually directed by the spirit, and based on students questions. He does His best to ensure every student questions are answered.
Very energetic and passionate about the class. He assigns a few papers and attendance and they are your grade.
